name: @dallmo/yaml
description: a simple function to read yaml file, and return as json

tasks.test-deno: cd etc; rm -f deps.ts; ln -s ./deps.deno.ts ./deps.ts ; cd ../test; deno test --allow-read
tasks.test-jsr: cd etc; rm -f deps.ts; ln -s ./deps.jsr.ts ./deps.ts ; cd ../test; deno test --allow-read
